summary: Completed comprehensive second iteration testing of ecommerce store. All previous issues have been resolved. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional with order success page now displaying correctly. Mobile responsiveness excellent. Admin dashboard showing accurate statistics.
passed_tests: Complete shopping flow: browse products → add to cart → checkout → order success (FIXED)
Order success page displays correctly with order details and customer information
Generated discount codes shown on order success page when applicable
Cart page works perfectly on direct navigation
Discount code application works correctly (10% off for valid codes)
Invalid/used discount codes properly rejected with error messages
Admin dashboard shows accurate statistics (33 orders, $7679.62 revenue, 3 discount codes)
All backend APIs working (12/12 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Mobile responsive design with working mobile menu and navigation
All navigation links work correctly on desktop and mobile
Modern vibrant UI with orange-pink gradients as requested
Product listing displays all 8 products correctly
Add to cart functionality updates cart count properly
Cart operations (add, update, remove items) working correctly
Order processing and success flow complete
Continue shopping button returns to homepage correctly
